name: B. Cows and Poker Game
statement:
There are cows playing poker at a table. For the current betting phase,
each player’s status is either "", "", or "", and does not change
throughout the phase. To increase the suspense, a player whose current
status is not "" may show his/her hand to the table. However, so as not
to affect any betting decisions, he/she may only do so if all other
players have a status of either "" or "". The player’s own status may be
either "" or "".Find the number of cows that can currently show their
hands without affecting any betting decisions.
